reviewText: My words are unnecessary, one cannot help but love Tenzin Gyatso!
this is a duplicate material of the path to happiness. not happy
Get teachings and meditation advice from the Dalai Lama, compassion and his clarity of meditation practices for all travelling the path is on this DVD

This book is another great work of wisdom by the Dalai Lama, but this is also not a read for the weekend buddist.  If your looking for something to help you become a better meditator, this is it, but its not an idiots guide to meditation.

This is an unglamorous lecture/lesson in meditation. Don't expect a mindblower. This is the REAL Dalai Lama , serious, deep,
no nonsense and full of information. No room for warm and fuzzy here. This is for learning.
